title: I wasted $1742 on MYSTERY TECH...
description: Check out the latest LG OLED tech!  SURPRISE two episodes of Mystery Tech in two days let's gooooo The Azeron Gaming Controller...thing on Amazon:  Intel Beast Canyon NUC 11 Extreme on Amazon:  Apple MagSafe Battery Pack on Amazon:   By using our Amazon affiliate links we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.  My new podcast @TheBackmarkers!  I have a TikTok!  My Twitch channel:  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
